content: to end of row* repeat from * to * on every row tie little knots to the roots of the fringes as you go to secure them and keep the edge of the scarf nice and tidy once you have made the knots you can cut the loops open for a striped version - check from badger wrist warmers once you reach the desired width bind-off loosely using the standard bind-off method try your best to bind-off with a similar gauge as your cast-on so one side will not become significantly tighter and shorter than the other knitting pattern by milena pauliina milena juhola ©copyright @milenapauliina 5 2023 this pattern is for personal use only the pattern is not to #badgerset be copied sold or redistributed neither is the sale of garments made from this pattern allowed
